result.arabic_text: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ حَقّٗاۚ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابٗا مُّهِينٗا
result.translation: Hao ndio makafiri kweli. Na tumewaandalia makafiri adhabu ya kudhalilisha.
result.footnotes: Hawa wote ndio walio ungama ukafiri wao ulio wazi. Na Mwenyezi Mungu amekwisha waahidi wao na mifano ya hao adhabu kali yenye kudhalilisha.
